    • Field Detail

      • colorIdentifier

        private final java.lang.String colorIdentifier

    • Constructor Detail

      • CcddClassesComponent.ModifiableColor

        CcddClassesComponent.ModifiableColor(java.lang.String colorIdentifier,
                                    int red,
                                    int green,
                                    int blue)
        Modifiable color class constructor. Allows assigning an identifier to the color for the purpose of identifying those Swing components that utilize the color in the event the color's characteristics are changed
        Parameters:
        colorIdentifier - color identifier. The identifier must be unique for each modifiable color since this name is used to identify the color as being used by a particular Swing component. The program preferences key for the modifiable color information is used as the identifier
        red - red color component
        green - green color component
        blue - blue color component

        Modifiable color's identifier
